user: Relocate task D and insert two or-gates, a opening one and a closing one. After the already existing closing or-gate I want you to insert the following structure: First, add the closing or-gate followed by the opening one. If the condition corresponding to the opening or-gate is true, continue with the end of the process. If the condition is false, I want task D to be performed and the process to 'jump' back to the freshly added closing or-gate. In the resulting process model, task D only occurs in this certain 'back-jump' loop.
meaning: Task D is relocated to be performed within a loop that repeats between 1 and N times, controlled by two or-gates. If the condition of the opening or-gate is false, task D is executed and the process jumps back to the closing or-gate, otherwise, the process continues to the end.
